name: 1-1/8 Carat T.G.W. Created White Sapphire Sterling Silver Wedding Ring

reviews.name: 1-1/8 Carat T.G.W. Created White Sapphire Sterling Silver Wedding Ring
reviews.reviewText: We bought this ring as a wedding ring bc I outgrew my other one. I like this ring because it doesn't go all the way around like an infinity ring so if I need to later on, I can get it resized. It looks amazing and is EXACTLY what I wanted! I wear it everyday and love it :)
reviews.title: 08 June 2013

reviews.name: 1-1/8 Carat T.G.W. Created White Sapphire Sterling Silver Wedding Ring
reviews.reviewText: this ring is beautiful and when seeing it in person, it was much more than the pictures showed.
reviews.title: lovely ring, way more than i expected

reviews.name: 1-1/8 Carat T.G.W. Created White Sapphire Sterling Silver Wedding Ring
reviews.reviewText: This is so beautiful. It looks very expensive, and feels expensive. Everyone has asked me where I bought, and how expensive. I just smile, and say Thank You.
reviews.title: Brillant

reviews.name: 1-1/8 Carat T.G.W. Created White Sapphire Sterling Silver Wedding Ring
reviews.reviewText: This ring met my expectations and is reasonably priced enough that I can afford to buy another with some color this time! ~ I chose a Wal-Mart-based storehouse ring rather than one shipped from another company because I wanted a solid guarantee & I wanted it in a hurry; it shipped quickly, just as I expected. Site-to-Store pick up was a breeze as well. ~ I've worn this ring for 2 weeks now without removing it for dishes, showers, or light gardening and it's retaining it's shine and clarity so I will start taking better care of it now that it's passed the test. ~ It IS a little THICK, due to the stainless type sterling used to make the band but I suspected that so nothing upsetting, just something to know. I've noticed that most rings of this type and quality are made heavier and thicker from ANY company that I've dealt with. Overall I'm very pleased since I didn't want to spend much over $50-$100. I've lost expensive diamonds from settings in the past so I wanted something I could wear daily without any worry if I happen to lose or trash it. These Wal-Mart rings are very pretty and fit that purpose.
reviews.title: Ring just as it was dipicted and described.

reviews.name: 1-1/8 Carat T.G.W. Created White Sapphire Sterling Silver Wedding Ring
reviews.reviewText: This ring is very pretty and I will wear it proudly
reviews.title: Pretty
